name: HardEnough
description: Did you ever dreamed to play a multidimensional shark running his way through obstacle to reach his goal ! Well, dont look any futher, Sharky, our little buddy want to reach the mighty chest as soon as possible. Unfortunately, the fastest way is blocked by multiple object. But Sharky has a special set of skill to change his physical form. He can become as fluid as water and flow through the smallest of hole or become as solid as a brick and run face-first in the pile of logs to destory them. Help Sharky reach the final chest in the shortest time using those dual set of skills and become the fastest Shark in the multivers.
